Player History
Drafted in 1st round, 12th overall pick, by Cleveland in 1971...
Had first career hit on 9/1/1971, off Chuck Nieson (MIN)...
Hit first career homerun on 9/13/1971, off Cecil Butler (OAK)...
Injured on 10/1/1973 with a Pulled Groin Muscle, out for 5 weeks...
Won Player of the Week award on 5/26/1976, hitting .625 with 0 HR, 7 RBI...
Signed as a free agent by Los Angeles on 2/4/1980 to a 3-year deal worth $1,790,000 per year...
Signed as a free agent by California on 2/9/1983 to a 2-year deal worth $642,123 per year...
Signed as a free agent by Cleveland on 2/14/1985 to a 3-year deal worth $980,000 per year...
